-Пофикшены некоторые баги

-Теперь мод на GitHub'е
[yellow]v2.0

-Изменен способ получения тория

description: THC is our workshop's name(The Time Has Changed).This is a mod which provides extra industrial content for Mindustry.Now we have English and Chinese version--just change your language in Mindustry settings.Made by THC Workshop in China.Beta 0.1 updates:A newwwwww mod!!! THC工业，该说明无法汉化，在设置中将语言调至中文在游戏内即可正常汉化。
